title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added Copilot feature documentation: GraphQL API for issue assignment, firewall UI, and issue form support.
Removed redundant legal notices and duplicated ARC introductions across Actions documentation.
Updated workflow template documentation with permissions note and reusable workflows advice.
Clarified that internal repositories have minimum read access regardless of base permissions.
Fixed oneOf nested fields rendering in webhook documentation generator and added tests.
summary:

- Clarified that internal repositories have minimum read access regardless of base permissions.
- Fixed oneOf nested fields rendering in webhook documentation generator and added tests.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added Copilot feature documentation: GraphQL API for issue assignment, firewall UI, and issue form support.
- Removed redundant legal notices and duplicated ARC introductions across Actions documentation.
- Updated workflow template documentation with permissions note and reusable workflows advice.
- Clarified that internal repositories have minimum read access regardless of base permissions.
- Fixed oneOf nested fields rendering in webhook documentation generator and added tests.

### Title
Update Copilot docs, remove legal notices, clarify repository permissions, fix webhook rendering
